dataList.content: Activating this E.G.O's Passive may cause relevant E.G.O Gift effects to deactivate or weaken.

※ Unbrilliant Glory Gregor, Command : Meltdown Faust, and To Remain Oneself Hong Lu can be obtained only via the [Pilgrimage of Compassion New E.G.O Extraction].
※ Tidal Elegy Ishmael can be obtained only as a [Pilgrimage of Compassion Event Reward].

※ Unbrilliant Glory Gregor, Command : Meltdown Faust, and To Remain Oneself Hong Lu can be obtained only via the [Pilgrimage of Compassion New E.G.O Extraction].
※ Tidal Elegy Ishmael can be obtained only as a [Pilgrimage of Compassion Event Reward].

※ Unbrilliant Glory Gregor, Command : Meltdown Faust, and To Remain Oneself Hong Lu can be obtained only via the [Pilgrimage of Compassion New E.G.O Extraction].
※ Tidal Elegy Ishmael can be obtained only as a [Pilgrimage of Compassion Event Reward].
